entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers this morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 late this afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022
